Package com.oap2024team7.team7mediastreamingapp.controllers

Class EditAccountController

java.lang.Object
com.oap2024team7.team7mediastreamingapp.controllers.EditAccountController
public class EditAccountController extends Object
Controller class for the Edit Account screen. This class is responsible for handling user input and updating the customer's account information.
Author:
Agata (Agy) Olaussen (@agyCoding)

    • setUpgradeButtonVisibility

      private void setUpgradeButtonVisibility()
      Hide "Upgrade to Premium" button if the account already is premium and show it if it's Free. Also, hide "Unsubscribe" button if the account is Free and show it if it's Premium.
